home.status-ready: Stable Diffusion is ready to use!

in-paint.txt: In-Painting (select the area which the AI will paint into)

settings.live-preview: Show a live preview of the image (disable this for faster image generation)
settings.fix-face: Fix incorrect faces and eyes (uses GFPGAN)
settings.upscale: Upscale the image to 4x resolution using:

preview-prompt.part1: Type a prompt and press the "Make Image" button.
preview-prompt.part2: You can set an "Initial Image" if you want to guide the AI.
preview-prompt.part3: You can also add modifiers like "Realistic", "Pencil Sketch", "ArtStation" etc by browsing through the "Image Modifiers" section and selecting the desired modifiers.
preview-prompt.part4: Click "Advanced Settings" for additional settings like seed, image size, number of images to generate etc.

advanced-settings.sound-disc: Will play a sound so user can hear when image is done.
advanced-settings.turbo-disc: Generates images faster, but uses an additional 1 GB of GPU memory
advanced-settings.beta-disc:
Get the latest features immediately (but could be less stable). 
Please restart the program after changing this.
